## WchPlaceholder.placeholder$ property

Event exposing the current placeholder. If no placeholder exists or placeholders are disabled, this will return 'undefined'.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
placeholder$: Observable<AuthoringPlaceholder>;
```
